items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Utility Bill issued by London City Utilities is valid until 2023-12-31.
Data for the years 2020, 2021, and 2022 is available; Ellipro scores are provided.
Bank account and postal details are available, including SWIFT code and postal code.
No information about company directorship was released in the annual report.
No information about company tax documentation was provided in the annual report.
No details about regulatory compliance were disclosed in the annual report.
Detailed information about business activities, global operations, and community role.
No PEP screening data was disclosed in the annual report.
Revenue details were disclosed: Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars (2023).
Market capitalization disclosed: 489,320 million dollars as of December 31, 2023.
